      • Game

        public Game(java.util.List<Player> players,
            java.util.Map<Player,ClientHandler> handlerMap,
            GameRulesStruct rules,
            ServerTUI view)
        Creates a game with specified dimensions of the board, winning length and random starter.
        Parameters:
        players - List of players
        handlerMap - Map of players and their handlers
        rules - Rules of the game

    • Method Detail

      • randomPlayer

        private void randomPlayer()
        Sets current player to a random player.

      • nextPlayer

        private void nextPlayer()
        Sets currentPlayer to the next player.

      • play

        private void play()
        Notifies the players of game start, select a random player and requests the first move.

      • requestMove

        private void requestMove(Player player)
        Requests a move from given player. Notifies all players of a new turn. If a player has been replaced by a ComputerPlayer, its determineMove method is called and processMove with the result.
        Parameters:
        player - Player whose turn it is

      • processMove

        public void processMove(ClientHandler handler,
                        TowerCoordinates coords)
        Processes a move determined by the given coordinates. Notifies players of game endings. Handles invalid moves.
        Parameters:
        handler - ClientHandler caller, null for a move by a ComputerPlayer
        coords - Coordinates of the move

      • replaceClient

        public void replaceClient(ClientHandler client)
        Drops the given player and replaces it with a ComputerPlayer with smart strategy with the same ID. Anti-cheat measure for rage quits.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to replace

      • expectsHandlerInput

        public boolean expectsHandlerInput(ClientHandler handler)

      • getHandler

        private ClientHandler getHandler(Player player)
        Gets the handler belonging to a player.
        Parameters:
        player - A player
        Returns:
        Its handler, null if ComputerPlayer

      • broadcastMessage

        private void broadcastMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message through all ClientHandlers.
        Parameters:
        message - A message

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
